ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.description: Please enter your registered email address. We will send you a password reset link via email.
ForgotPassword.successMessage: We have sent a password reset email to {email}.
ForgotPassword.successInstruction: Please click the link in the email to set your new password.
ForgotPassword.checkSpamFolder: If you don't receive the email, please check your spam folder.
ForgotPassword.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
ForgotPassword.errorMessage: Failed to send password reset email

ResetPassword.title: Set New Password
ResetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully updated. Please log in with your new password.
ResetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
ResetPassword.passwordComplexity: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol
ResetPassword.invalidTokenMessage: This link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.

nameAddress.city: Please enter your city, ward, town, or village.

survey.foundId: Please select one option for how you heard about Engineer Cafe.
survey.foundOther: Please enter how you heard about Engineer Cafe (Other).
